name: Moonfin
overview: Custom UI and settings sync for Jellyfin
description: Moonfin brings a modern TV-style UI to Jellyfin web. Features include: custom navbar, media bar with featured content, Jellyseerr integration, and cross-device settings synchronization. Works with Android TV, Roku, Tizen, webOS, and Web clients.

versions.changelog:
Features:
- Media bar trailer previews using YouTube IFrame API with SponsorBlock integration
- Android TV-inspired media bar redesign with logos, rating badges, and genre pills

Improvements:
- Seerr v3 support with auto-detection and direct iframe URL option
- Server-wide TMDB API key with user notifications
- Dynamic icon swapping for Jellyseerr/Seerr
- Sidebar: settings moved under libraries with separator
- Overlay history management for proper mobile back button navigation
- Admin panel no longer blocked by plugin (whitelist-based route detection)
- Sensitive data masked in console logs
- Code cleanup: removed debug logging, dead code, and redundant comments

- Seerr v3 support with auto-detection (version-based)
- Direct iframe URL option for Seerr behind reverse proxies
- Server-wide TMDB API key with user notifications
- Removed Rotten Tomatoes rating from details page
- Added dynamic icon swapping for Jellyseerr/Seerr
- Updated README with Seerr v3 reverse proxy documentation

- Left sidebar navigation (configurable via navbarPosition)
- Three-way settings merge with snapshot-based conflict resolution
- MDBList server-side caching and batch pre-fetching

Improvements:
- PNG to SVG migration for all rating icons
- Updated README and admin config page

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed Jellyseerr session persistence (JSON deserialization)
- Fixed Jellyseerr sessions on local IP addresses
- Fixed Jellyseerr cookie rotation causing unexpected logouts
- Fixed mobile media bar overlapping first library row

- TMDB episode ratings with server-side caching
- Drag & drop sortable rating sources
- Jellyseerr dual login (Jellyfin + local accounts)
- Edit Metadata/Images/Subtitles/Identify open as native dialogs
- Create New Playlist from details page
- Fixed homescreen context menu interception
- Fixed subtitle picker triggering details overlay during playback

- Fixed Jellyseerr 404 when clicking links in iframe
- Plugin now auto-registers file transformations on load (no manual task needed after updates)

- Integrated File Transformation plugin for automatic web UI injection
- Fixed bug where media bar did not load right away
- Added server-wide MDBList API key support
- Updated user settings and UI

Initial release with core features: navbar, media bar, custom details screens, IMDBList integration, Jellyseerr integration, and settings sync.
 Hope you like it!
